sentences.en: An exponential function is one in which the variable appears in an exponent.
sentences.cn: 指数函数是指数中出现变量的函数.

sentences.en: Concepts of impulsive exponential stabilization for general differential systems are proposed.
sentences.cn: 摘要针对一般形式的常微分系统提出了脉冲指数镇定的概念.

sentences.en: Exponential shape transducer horn is adopted to linear speed.
sentences.cn: 采用了指数形变幅杆放大纵振振幅以提高电机速度.

sentences.en: I’m writing a book about trigonometric and exponential functions.
sentences.cn: 我在写一本关于三角和指数功能的书。

sentences.en: Im writing a book about trigonometric and exponential functions.
sentences.cn: 我在写一本关于三角和指数功能的书.

sentences.en: It is well known that experimental � � - ray absorption curves are roughly exponential.
sentences.cn: 众所周知,实验上测得的β射线吸收曲线大致是指数型的.

sentences.en: Populations tend to grow at an exponential rate.
sentences.cn: 人口趋向于以指数比率增长.

sentences.en: The confidence level and uncertainty limit of even exponential of uniform R.
sentences.cn: 均匀随机变数偶指数函数之均值不确定范围之信心准位.

sentences.en: The first exponential has been introduced to allow for variation of amplitude with attitude.
sentences.cn: 前面的指数是为了考虑波动振幅随高度变化而引入的.

sentences.en: The Fisher - type statistic is very effective for testing outlier in exponential sample.
sentences.cn: 在指数样本异常值的检验中,Fisher型统计量是十分有效的.

sentences.en: The frictional dissipation will introduce an exponential decay.
sentences.cn: 摩擦耗散可导致指数式的衰减.

sentences.en: The hydrolysis rate constant increases at a exponential function with temperature increase.
sentences.cn: 温度升高,水解速率常数呈指数函数关系递增.

sentences.en: The logarithmic function is defined as the inverse of the exponential function.
sentences.cn: 对数函数是作为指数函数的反函数来定义的.

sentences.en: The reason of bias for using the exponential deliverability equation is analyzed.
sentences.cn: 理论上分析了指数式产能方程产生偏差的原因.

sentences.en: These exponential or logarithmic relationship, that characterize harmonious growth with changing proportions, are termed " allometric ".
sentences.cn: 作为比例有变化的协调增长这些指数或对数关系被标为 “ 开度量 ” 关系.

sentences.en: These measurements showed that the electronic heat well below Tc was dominated by an exponential dependence.
sentences.cn: 这些测量结果表明,在远低于Tc的温度下,电子比热是按指数规律变化的.

words.tran_cn: [数] 指数；典型；说明者，说明物

phrases.tran_cn: 指数期；对数生长期；对数期

trans.tran_cn: 指数的，幂数的，越来越快的
trans.tran_en: exponential growth, increase etc becomes faster as the amount of the thing that is growing increases
